Translations.Text: Maybe my nasledovat kuzelnik they bol winners
When kuzelnik pojdem they said do Pharaoh my zaplatit my Robit bol winners
He said Ano indeed; ona vecer bol mna
Moses said do them Throw co ona throw
They threw ich lano lepit sa said Pharaoh's majesty my bol victors
Moses threw jeho staff whereupon it lastovicka co they fabricated
Kuzelnik fell prostrate
They said My verit v Lord universe
Lord z Moses Aaron
He said Robi ona verit him before ja dat ona permission? He bol tvoj teacher taught ona kuzlo. Ona robit iste zalozit out! Ja sever tvoj hands nohy alternate strana. Ja crucify ona all
They said This nie zmenit our decision; our Lord my spatny listok
My hope our Lord forgive us our zhresit zvlast ze my bol prvy believers
My inspirovat Moses Cestovat Moj servants ona pursued
Pharaoh sent do mesto callers
(Proclaiming) This bol male gang
They ihned opposing us
all beware z them
Consequently my zbavit them z zahrada jaro
A treasures a honorable position
Potom my robit it inheritance Dieta Izrael
They pursued them east
